message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to our commitment to quality and innovation. Considering its exceptional features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. For you, we are offering this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly extraordinary. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
